title: Anatomy of a Serial Rapist
description: A London aggravated sex-crimes detective would discover his worst fears, in his quest to track down and capture a violent serial rapist, who repeatedly gives the cops some provoking clues prior to attacking and after attacking a victim.Set in modern-day London, the serial rapists always took the time out to surgically remove the clitoris of each victim, after drugging them with anesthetics, and tattooing a clue on their cleavage .But just when British detectives kept their eyes focused on a trail of rapes, and their hopes on catching an elusive perpetrator, something much bigger and more sinister was about to happen.
author: Dennis E. Adonis
